mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,osp_news_datano,osp_news_data,osp_news_datatitle, osp_news_content1,osp_news_content2,osp_news_content3,osp_news_content4,osp_news_pic1,osp_news_pic2 osp_news_pic3,osp_news_pic4,osp_news_date,osp_news_origin from outside_pet_news) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=6

select * from (select rownum rnum,osp_news_datano,osp_news_data,osp_news_datatitle, osp_news_content1,osp_news_content2,osp_news_content3,osp_news_content4,osp_news_pic1,osp_news_pic2 osp_news_pic3,osp_news_pic4,osp_news_date,osp_news_origin from outside_pet_news) where osp_news_datatitle like '%'||#{osp_news_datatitle}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rnum,osp_news_datano,osp_news_data,osp_news_datatitle, osp_news_content1,osp_news_content2,osp_news_content3,osp_news_content4,osp_news_pic1,osp_news_pic2 osp_news_pic3,osp_news_pic4,osp_news_date,osp_news_origin from outside_pet_news) where (osp_news_content1 like '%'||#{osp_news_content1}||'%' or osp_news_content2 like '%'||#{osp_news_content2}||'%' or osp_news_content3 like '%'||#{osp_news_content3}||'%' or osp_news_content4 like '%'||#{osp_news_content4}||'%')

select * from (select rownum rnum,osp_news_datano,osp_news_data,osp_news_datatitle, osp_news_content1,osp_news_content2,osp_news_content3,osp_news_content4,osp_news_pic1,osp_news_pic2 osp_news_pic3,osp_news_pic4,osp_news_date,osp_news_origin from outside_pet_news) where osp_news_origin like '%'||#{osp_news_origin}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into outside_pet_newscomment values((select max(pet_comment_no)+1 from outside_pet_newscomment),default,#{pet_comment_contents},#{pet_comment_writer},#{pet_comment_newsno},default)
